org.apache.hama.bsp.ft

Interface BSPFaultTolerantService<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsyncRcvdMsgCheckpointImpl

    public interface BSPFaultTolerantService<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    BSPFaultTolerantService defines the fault tolerance service behavior. The fault tolerance service is a feature of a running job and not the system. A class defined on this behavior has the responsibility to create two objects. The first object FaultTolerantMasterService is used by the job at BSPMaster to handle fault tolerance related steps at the master. The second object FaultTolerantPeerService is used to define the behavior of object that would implement the fault tolerance related steps for recovery inside BSPPeer (in each of the BSP peers doing computations)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String FT_SERVICE_CONF
      The token by which a job can register its fault-tolerance service.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Creates the instance of FaultTolerantMasterService that would handle fault-tolerance related steps at BSPMaster task scheduler.
      FaultTolerantPeerService<M> constructPeerFaultTolerance(BSPJob job, BSPPeer bspPeer, PeerSyncClient syncClient, InetSocketAddress peerAddress, TaskAttemptID taskAttemptId, long superstep, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, MessageManager<M> messenger)
      Creates an instance of FaultTolerantPeerService which defines the steps that has to be taken inside a peer for fault-tolerance.

    • Method Detail

      • constructMasterFaultTolerance

        FaultTolerantMasterService constructMasterFaultTolerance(BSPJobID jobId,
                                                       int maxTaskAttempts,
                                                       TaskInProgress[] tasks,
                                                       org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                                       MasterSyncClient masterClient,
                                                       TaskAllocationStrategy allocationStrategy)
                                                         throws Exception
        Creates the instance of FaultTolerantMasterService that would handle fault-tolerance related steps at BSPMaster task scheduler.
        Parameters:
        jobId - The identifier of the job.
        maxTaskAttempts - Number of attempts allowed for recovering from failure.
        tasks - The list of tasks in the job.
        conf - The job configuration object.
        masterClient - The synchronization client used by BSPMaster.
        allocationStrategy - The task allocation strategy of the job.
        Returns:
        An instance of class inheriting FaultTolerantMasterService
        Throws:
        Exception

      • constructPeerFaultTolerance

        FaultTolerantPeerService<M> constructPeerFaultTolerance(BSPJob job,
                                                      BSPPeer bspPeer,
                                                      PeerSyncClient syncClient,
                                                      InetSocketAddress peerAddress,
                                                      TaskAttemptID taskAttemptId,
                                                      long superstep,
                                                      org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                                      MessageManager<M> messenger)
                                                                                              throws Exception
        Creates an instance of FaultTolerantPeerService which defines the steps that has to be taken inside a peer for fault-tolerance.
        Parameters:
        bspPeer - The peer
        syncClient - The synchronization client used by peer.
        superstep - The superstep from which the peer is initialized.
        conf - job configuration object
        messenger - The messaging system between the peers
        Returns:
        An instance of class inheriting FaultTolerantPeerService
        Throws:
        Exception
